comment.author: 63844591@N04
comment._content: I think this may be Thomas Healy of Summerhill Waterford. The 1901 census has him living at Summerhill which is a direct continuation of Bridge Street

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/66105333@N06] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/63844591@N04] This one is an odd one. From the phrasing of the description in the photographer's day book, it could be a copy of a picture of T. Healy, of 9 Bridge Street OR could be a copy of a picture of an unidentified man ordered from Poole Photographers by T. Healy...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons
